scripts.dev: set -a && source .env.local && set +a && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.dev:chat: set -a && source .env.local && set +a && turbo run dev --filter=@chatjs/chat
scripts.build: set -a && source .env.local && set +a && turbo run build
scripts.fetch:models: set -a && source .env.local && set +a && turbo run fetch:models --filter=@chatjs/chat
scripts.test:playwright: set -a && source .env.local && set +a && turbo run test:playwright --filter=@chatjs/chat
scripts.publish:cli: bun run template:sync && bun --filter @chat-js/cli build && npm publish --ignore-scripts -w packages/cli
